mean_cn: n. 文献资料，文件材料
mean_en: the documents, records, etc., that are used to prove something or make something official
sentence: The documentation contains the details of the agreement, so read it carefully.
sentence_trans: 这文件材料包含协议细节，所以请仔细阅读。
word_etyma: docu教 ＋ ment物 ＋ ation表名词 → documentation文件材料
